column5: Hi guys! I am new to the board and am looking for some feed back.I want to book a trip to the Red Lake area this summer for some walleye fishing.We were thinking Nungusser Lake.Can anyone provide us with feedback about the lodges in that area? Any help would be appreciated. Thanks in advance.
welcome to the board, sorry I can't help out there, so welcome is all I've got...
Welcome. I sent you a pm with some info for you.
Welcome aboard!  HERE is a really good place to look!

Hey Trautmann,been fishing Anglers Kingdom on Nungusser for the last 8 yrs now.Excellent walleye and pike fishing,great equipment,comfy cabins and great food and service.Going up twice this season.Early spring,and again in August.Check them out at www.anglerskingdom.com.

If you are talking about Red Lake in western Ontario go to http//fishingminnesota.com/ and look for the Ontario section or plug Sunset Country Ontario into your search engine. A lot more on western Ontario. than this site which is very good for eastern Ont.
